New York University Archives
Curtis and Linda Hoffman Collection on the University Heights Campus Closing
Hoffman, Linda
Hoffman, Curtis
MC.348
.25 Linear Feet in 1 folder in shared housing
1973 Curtis and Linda Hoffman are alumni of the New York University at the University Heights campus. This collection consists of a button and the lyrics of "Bye-Bye University Heights" written for Senior Day in 1973.
Scope and Contents
The Curtis and Linda Hoffman Collection on the University Heights Campus Closing consists of a button and the lyrics of "Bye-Bye University Heights" written for Senior Day in 1973.
Biographical Note
Curtis and Linda Hoffman are alumni of the New York University at the University Heights campus.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Curtis and Linda Hoffman in September 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2022.006.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Curtis and Linda Hoffman Collection on the University Heights Campus Closing; MC 348; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, materials were rehoused in an archival box and folder.
